properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters OF Northwestern Puerto Rico out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 1 at 9:42PM AST until March 3 at 2:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...A northerly swell will invade the Atlantic waters starting
tonight...

.Winds and seas will increase with the arrival of a frontal
boundary and a northerly swell, that will sink southwards and
spread across the Atlantic waters and Mona Passage tonight and
lingering into mid-week. Increasingly rough and hazardous seas
can therefore be expected.

* WHAT...Choppy and increasing seas 5 to 7 feet expected.
Increasing east to northeast winds 10 to 20 kt with
occasionally higher gusts.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters of Northwestern Puerto Rico out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 2 PM Monday to 2 PM AST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MONDAY TO 2 PM AST TUESDAY
